course_description: Climatology studies the properties of the atmosphere and ocean and the resulting climates. We emphasize the energy cascade of the climate system and climate change.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131 or ENVS_OX 131 or  BIOL_OX 111 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in Math & Science Center - W501
sections: Class Nbr: 2901, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: C. Hickcox, Status: Open
